thread.title: Rishi Kapoor wants 'Rendezvous With Simi Garewal' back on air | Zee News
thread.title_full: Rishi Kapoor wants 'Rendezvous With Simi Garewal' back on air | Zee News

title: Rishi Kapoor wants 'Rendezvous With Simi Garewal' back on air | Zee News
text:
Rishi Kapoor wants 'Rendezvous With Simi Garewal' back on air By Raghav Jaitly | Last Updated: Friday, February 24, 2017 - 18:24 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Bollywood veteran Rishi Kapoor, who is known for his heartfelt tweets, on Friday congratulated former talk show hostess Simi Garewal for her astonishing YouTube milestone. You will be amazed to know that the 69-year-old actress' old television program 'Rendezvous With Simi Garewal' recently crossed 50 million views on the popular video streaming website. 
The 'Kapoor & Sons' actor also expressed his desire of bringing back the much-talked-about series back on air. "Amazing! So very happy Simi,you achieved this by your sheer hard work,dedication and perseverance. We need your show"Rendezvous"to air ASAP!" he tweeted. 
The duo has worked together in flicks like 'Mera Naam Joker', 'Kabhi Kabhie' and 'Karz'. Amazing! So very happy Simi,you achieved this by your sheer hard work,dedication and perseverance. We need your show"Rendezvous"to air ASAP! pic.twitter.com/tVgbeExahK 
â€” Hari Om! (@chintskap) 24 February 2017 
'Rendezvous With Simi Garewal' was considered to be one of the biggest TV shows of its era. Top notch celebrities from all walks of lives graced the program with their presence. Their candid confessions and honest comments made it quite famous among viewers of all age groups. First Published: Friday, February 24, 2017 - 18:24 More from zeenews
